content: *this triangle shawl is lacy light and lovely lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 30247 *ccc-shawl pdf* skill level intermediate size one size lion® crochet cotton article #770 *discontinued* 1600 yards crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm gauge after 5 row shawl should measure approximately 6 inches across top and 3 inches from center of top to bottom of point special stitch point shell entire shawl is worked holding 2 strands of thread together after working the body complete the project with shell border see l0122ad new year s shawl 1 for the vanna s glamour version 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/new-years-shawl
